tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted her from the beginning of my pregnancy. She heard all my symptoms and my high risk factors patiently. Initially, I was worried about a lot many things but the way she explained took all my worries away. She never called me for unnecessary visits. She never prescribed any unnecessary tests or ultrasounds. Moreover, she never told me to get it done from a certain place only which usually doctors do. She is always available on calls and on wats app also. She replies promptly. She thinks of all the pros and cons before prescribing any medicine. I went for the check up and just by looking at me.. she told me what would be the impression of the ultrasound. Her experience speaks volumes about her hard work. She is the only reason that I visit VENKATESHWAR HOSPITAL after having an awful experience with their cardiology department and emergency section. This I am writing after an experience of about 8 months. Due to her constant support and guidance, all my risk factors are under control now. I strongly recommend her for all the women who are planning to start a family and want to have a hassle free pregnancy period. Thank you so much ma'am for being so observant and understanding.
reply_text: Thank you Chandni for trusting me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited the doctor thinking I have gynaecological issue as I experienced extreme pain in lower stomach. She was very prompt in identifying that it maybe a kidney stone issue which later my ultrasound reports also directed which she adviced to get it done . She identified my other health issues and after carefully observing all my reports, recommended another speciality as it was getting out of her area of practice. She explained everything clearly, suggested me to get video consultation as I live in Assam so it's impossible to travel for future consultations. She devoted a lot of time explaining each medicine, was friendly, and didn't give unnecessary medications. She's a gem of a person and I would highly recommend her. Thank you so much Doctor!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
To begin with all the happy moments which Iam spending with my new born baby prisha are priceless and can’t be expressed. 
Before this since I came to know that I have conceived it was a mixed ride for me with both happiness ,anxiety and fear being a first time mother. 
As how things would un fold in the coming days.
For the first time I met Dr Dipti I was convinced and sure that she is the one who can distance me from all those fears and so did she. She took great care of mine and always  advising me proper medication diet . As  I was nearing my due date her concern towards me also increased. Be it any side effects or any sort of discomforts she was always there for me.Really she’s a wonderful doctor who has great dedication towards her profession. Both me and my husband are grateful to her. She ensured that our nine month journey was smooth.  
May god bless her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
NEVER EVER VISIT HER! NEGATIVE FEEDBACK 
 I entered her room and thought she would be as friendly as other gynaecologists are but she was complete opposite. She was so uninterested to even look at me, busy with her phone that she didn’t even listen to me, ****** ****** **** *** ***** I had to repeat all my problems like thrice and then also she was into her own zone. 
During examination, she called up some lady and started gossiping with her. 
I’ve never had such a horrible experience with a gynaecologist. ******** ** ** ***** ********* *** ***** ** *** ***** * ********* **** ***** *** ***** ** **** ******* ** *** ********** 
I just wish she reads all of this *** **** * ****** ** *** ****** ** **** ***** ** ******* ** ***** ** ********* **** **** ** ***** ******* ****
reply_text:
I was on phone talking to my colleague "some lady" about a different patient who was clinically more ill and critical which required an urgent discussion. 


It's true, if you are not happy then do not visit a doctor again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ***** ***** ** *** **** ******* Ma'am Treat was very friendly and taken care like a family member. Ma'am ensures to spend time with each patient, makes them understand the underlying health problem & suggests the best treatment options to them. This astounding genuine support is provided to all the patients, who Consult her. If you are looking for *** **** gynaecologist do visit her. *** **** ** ** **** ****** ****** I pray to God that ma'am have a long life and more successful in every area.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Prenatal Checkup,
review:
We are so glad to have consulted Dr. Dipti .  K Yadav. She is very friendly  sincere,************* *** ********** *** ********* *** ******** *** ** practical  in her approach .

I have delivered a baby girl on 12 th of august at venkateshwar hospital by Dr, Dipti. K. Yadav. We were consulting her from beginning. During the pregnancy I was diagnosed with IHCP( a liver disease) . We were little scared due to this but she guided us well through the whole pregnancy and helped me through each stage, she advised with every possible care which is required to ensure that delivery goes smooth,she recommended few tests to ensure there are no complications later, there are many occasions where we repeated our queries but always got clear response from her without being annoyed to answer it again.
Every consultation, she thoroughly  examines and provide all necessary precautions which needs to be taken care. *** *** ***** ******* *********** *********** 

she gave me full confidence and support through out my pregnancy with thyroid and IHCP  she guided me through proper channels and cleared all my confusions at time to time basis. the guidance from doctor had helped me alot to deliver a healthy baby normally .we trusted doctor's every decision and we are happy about it now. I highly recommend Dr. Dipti. K Yadav  to every  pregnant lady .

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Dipti Yadav is an amazing ,wonderful and a cheerful person.She makes u feel so comfortable during the complete tenure of pregnancy. She is ever smiling and is very patient to address one's problem.Most importantly, she always will have a personal touch with her patients and you will always feel safe in her hands. I will always recommend her in future.I visiting her during pregnancy. She guides you very well. I never felt uncomfortable while sharing silliest of my doubts with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for my delivery to Dr. Dipti. My experience with Dr Dipti was really gud. I had few complications. Till last moment  it was not clear how I am going to delivery my baby but I could see doctor was putting her full efforts n fortunately it was normal delivery was done in the end.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
My experience with Dr.Deepti was overwhelming.It was my second baby and a planned cesarean. The procedure was performed very professionally by her and the team. My post-ops recovery has also been good.I was looked after well by her team of nurses.Even in such a testing time of a pandemic she was readily available whenever need arised.
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Today we have visited clinic for an urgent  injection but doctor refused for it by saying that it's an compounder job and I will not do it. We have requested to do it on humanity basis but she was not ready to listen.

I think doctor without an heart is not good for soceity.
reply_text:
How could I administer an injection which is prescribed by someone else and I do not endorse it. 

You are simply using this platform to malign my reputation.
